description: This file contains CSS definitions for styling a web application, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Root class for the main application container, setting text alignment, background color, and other styles.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style class for the application logo, with fixed height and pointer events set to none.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Class for the application header, setting background, layout, and font-size properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for styling links in the application, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover effects.
